name: WUZZPOPPIN'
description:
WUZZPOPPIN’ is a first year project developed by BUAS students. The group consists of fourteen students, which consists of three programmers, six visual artists and five designers. We hope you’ll enjoy playing our game.

 

Our team:

Visual Artists ProgrammersDesign & Production Tom van der Veeken Sam Boots Tom van Bers Rosanne Grootjes Cass van de Bos Matteo Ugrote Kim Trouwborst Slava Tarkovskij Melina Martinez Dries Lonsain Davy Baak Saskia Janssen Radu Tandarica Sasja Bradic
